about_the_game:
Edibles is an epic 2D platformer designed to be released on the Nintendo switch but will first be available to play on Steam.

Edibles is the story of a tomato. A tomato who finds himself conscious as a result of a space time anomaly. Join this tomato on his quest to discover himself and pass on consciousness to his fellow edibles whilst trying to survive a perilous environment. There are no shortage of mortal ends to which a tomato can meet. Survive the first day, avoid ending up as an ingredient to tonight's spag bowl. Don't step on the grater!

Dozens of adorable food just waiting to become conscious but not all consciousness is good! If you were a pineapple, would you be good or bad? What about a garlic? Is a garlic male or female? A gherkin? A broccoli? How about a bean?

Anyway, you get the idea. Food comes to live. They want to live!

Lots of puzzles to solve to avoid ending up either squashed, eaten blended or just thrown away in the trash!

Escape the kitchen and find yourself in an ever ending world of beauty and woes!

Where can a tomato find peace? What is a tomato's purpose in life? You decide!
